title: We all should worry about the Dish and Sling TV cyberattack
description: A cyberattack on Dish Networks froze accounts and may have stolen customers' personal information. How does this keep happening?

title: Amazon, despite climate pledge, fought to kill emissions bill in Oregon
description: There's not enough renewable energy to keep up with Amazon's growth, so the company is turning to fossil fuels in Oregon despite its renewable energy promises.

title: The AI backlash is here. It’s focused on the wrong things.
description: Forget robot overlords. The more pressing risk is that humans will use AI to make things worse.
